meanings.definition: A place where printing is done.
meanings.sent1: The small printery was filled with printing machines.
meanings.sent2: I need to visit the printery to get some flyers printed.
meanings.sent3: The printery had a printer that never stopped churning out paper.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a busy printery, constantly producing new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The printery hummed with the sound of printing presses in action.

meanings.definition: A business or establishment where printing is carried out.
meanings.sent1: The local printery offers high-quality printing services.
meanings.sent2: I sent my design to the printery for them to print on t-shirts.
meanings.sent3: The printery owner joked that their ink was made of rainbow colors.
meanings.sent4: The printery was a beacon of productivity in the quiet town.
meanings.sent5: Walking into the printery felt like stepping into a world of creativity.
